mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gibraltar / surveyed by Captain P. Aldrich, assisted by Lieutts. A. Havergal, C.J. Baker, H.B. Anson & W. Richardson, H.M.S. Sylvia, 1885 ; engraved by Edwd. Weller
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Aldrich, Pelham, 1844-1930
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Wharton, W. J. L. (William James Lloyd), 1843-1905
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published at the Admiralty 12th. June, 1886, under the superintendence of Captain W.J.L. Wharton, R.N. Hydrographer. Sold by J.D. Potter agent for the sale of the Admiralty Charts, 31 Poultry & 11 King St. Tower Hill
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 66 x 47 cm. on sheet 69 x 49 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures and depth soundings.
"The coast line and topography are taken from the Ordinance Survey Maps, 1869."
Chart no. "144" printed in lower right margin.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nautical charts--Spain--Gibraltar, Bay of
Gibraltar, Bay of (Spain)--Navigation
